item.title: Five potholes in Cheltenham in carriageway to east of Park Place/ Andover Road intersection, 9th March
item.description:
Five potholes on northern side of traffic island on Andover Road, to the east of its crossing with Park Place. They are between nos. 16 and 18 Park Place, Cheltenham to give an alternative location. They have got deeper of late, but have been there in a lesser form for some while. They are now definitely more prominent.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 18 Park Place, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Legacy barriers on Shakespeare Road from the old Monkscroft Action Group MAG school, 9th March
item.description:
These barriers have been hit several times by cars and it gonna catch peoples arms or the handles of pushchairs and strollers. Can they be removed now from the pavement because they are non-functional and not needed. Thank you

item.title: Top layer of tarmac missing., 8th March
item.description:
Work across the junction of Chosen Way and Hucclecote Rd was done some months ago. Very quickly the top layer of tarmac began to break up and a couple of potholes formed. Work was done today, 8th March, and the potholes were filled. The missing top layer of tarmac was not fixed. The result is obviously going to be the repaired areas deteriorating quickly. Why not fix all faults at the same time?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 9b Hucclecote Road, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pirton Lane road surface unsafe approaching Morley Avenue, 8th March
item.description:
Road surface on Pirton Lane approaching Morley Avenue coming from Cheltenham Road East is un safe, drivers are dodging the unsafe surface which in turn could cause an accident and damaged to vehicles. This also puts pressure on cyclists who are also trying to dodge the un safe service. This part of the road needs resurfacing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 51 Pirton Lane, Churchdown
Report on FixMyStreet
